languages.text: {n}Маражай издает утробный смешок.{/n} "Почему же? Я обещал воссоединить ее с родичами. Долгожданная встреча в пыточной — я нахожу это... весьма трогательным. Им было бы что обсудить. И чем развлечь себя — и нас — в тесном семейном кругу".

{n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издает утробный смешок.{/n} "Почему же? Я обещал воссоединить ее с родичами. Долгожданная встреча в пыточной — я нахожу это... весьма трогательным. Им было бы что обсудить. И чем развлечь себя — и нас — в тесном семейном кругу".

They would have had much to discuss, but there would have been time to for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

{n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had much to discuss, but there would have been time to for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

{n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had much to discuss, but there would have been time to for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

{n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se ríe profundamente.{/n} «¿Por qué lo dices? Había prometido reunirla con su gente. Una esperada reunión en una cámara de tortura. Es... conmovedor. Habrían tenido muchísimo de lo que hablar, pero también habríamos sacado tiempo para divertirnos. A fin de cuentas, los primos nos juntamos muy pocas veces».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se ríe profundamente.{/n} «¿Por qué lo dices? Había prometido reunirla con su gente. Una esperada reunión en una cámara de tortura. Es... conmovedor. Habrían tenido muchísimo de lo que hablar, pero también habríamos sacado tiempo para divertirnos. A fin de cuentas, los primos nos juntamos muy pocas veces».

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋意味深长地大笑起来。{/n}“你怎么能这么说？我答应过，要让她和她的族人团聚。在刑讯室里久别重逢，我认为这......非常感人。到那个时候，他们会有很多事情需要讨论，而我们也会有很多时间可以享乐。毕竟，我们这些远房亲戚难得见面。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋意味深长地大笑起来。{/n}“你怎么能这么说？我答应过，要让她和她的族人团聚。在刑讯室里久别重逢，我认为这......非常感人。到那个时候，他们会有很多事情需要讨论，而我们也会有很多时间可以享乐。毕竟，我们这些远房亲戚难得见面。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは大笑いをした。{/n}「なぜそんなことを言うんだ？俺はあいつに同族と再会させてやると約束した。拷問室での待ちに待った再会だ…きっと感動するぞ。話し合うことはたくさんあっただろうが、楽しむ時間もあっただろう。俺らはいとこ同士でも滅多に集まらないからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは大笑いをした。{/n}「なぜそんなことを言うんだ？俺はあいつに同族と再会させてやると約束した。拷問室での待ちに待った再会だ…きっと感動するぞ。話し合うことはたくさんあっただろうが、楽しむ時間もあっただろう。俺らはいとこ同士でも滅多に集まらないからな」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pousse un long rire grave.{/n} « Tout de suite les grands mots ! Je lui ai promis de la conduire auprès des siens. Des retrouvailles tant attendues dans une salle de torture... Quoi de plus touchant, je vous le demande ? Ils auraient eu tant à se dire, mais nous aurions aussi eu le temps de nous divertir... Après tout, les cousinades sont fort rares, par chez nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pousse un long rire grave.{/n} « Tout de suite les grands mots ! Je lui ai promis de la conduire auprès des siens. Des retrouvailles tant attendues dans une salle de torture... Quoi de plus touchant, je vous le demande ? Ils auraient eu tant à se dire, mais nous aurions aussi eu le temps de nous divertir... Après tout, les cousinades sont fort rares, par chez nous. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht lang und tief.{/n} "Warum sagt Ihr das? Ich habe versprochen, sie mit ihrer Verwandtschaft wiederzuvereinen. Ein lang erwartetes Wiedersehen in einer Folterkammer. Das finde ich ... rührend. Sie hätten viel zu besprechen gehabt, doch es wäre auch Zeit für ein wenig Spaß geblieben ... Wir Vettern sehen uns schließlich so selten."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

Ein lang erwartetes Wiedersehen in einer Folterkammer. Das finde ich ... rührend. Sie hätten viel zu besprechen gehabt, doch es wäre auch Zeit für ein wenig Spaß geblieben ... Wir Vettern sehen uns schließlich so selten."

{n}Marazhai lacht lang und tief.{/n} "Warum sagt Ihr das? Ich habe versprochen, sie mit ihrer Verwandtschaft wiederzuvereinen. Ein lang erwartetes Wiedersehen in einer Folterkammer. Das finde ich ... rührend. Sie hätten viel zu besprechen gehabt, doch es wäre auch Zeit für ein wenig Spaß geblieben ... Wir Vettern sehen uns schließlich so selten."

A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, uzun ve derin bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Niye öyle diyorsun ki? Soydaşlarına kavuşturacağıma söz verdim işte. İşkence odasında olabilir ama... Bence son derece dokunaklı. Ne güzel, eski günleri yâd ederler. Bir yandan da eğlenirler. Malum, öyle her zaman bir araya gelme fırsatımız olmuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs long and deeply.{/n} "Why do you say that? I promised to reunite her with her kin. A long-awaited reunion in a torture chamber — I find that... very touching. They would have had so much to discuss, but there would have been time for fun as well — we cousins get together so rarely, after all."

Bence son derece dokunaklı. Ne güzel, eski günleri yâd ederler. Bir yandan da eğlenirler. Malum, öyle her zaman bir araya gelme fırsatımız olmuyor."
